name: Diecode
description:
Diecode is a challenging puzzle game / brain teaser created for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 . It currently features 22 unique puzzles!

How it works: 

Solve the puzzles by rolling the die around the grid. Match the eyes on the grid with the eyes on the die; recreate the required pattern on the grid to complete the level! 

Puzzles will get harder in higher levels, but remember: every puzzle can be solved through logical thinking. 

Credits:

Art: Adaptations of Kenney assets & free 3D dice model
Music & SFX: Bryan Davis
